page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: Of the Christian churches in Minehead seven denominations are represented. Congregation size varies according to the time of year.(See Tourism). The Church of England has 3 buildings. St.Michaels, St.Andrews and the tiny St.Peters on the Quay. The Roman Catholic church has a Nursing Convent attached to it. Other denominations belonging to the Minehead Council of Churches include the United Reformed Church, the Methodist Church, the Baptist Church, the Millbridge Evangelical Free Church and The Society of Friends.
